chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.sales.stage.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Sale Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, selection_item.title as _sales_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select GROUP BY _sales_stage ORDER BY _sales_stage

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.by.stage.type.bar
chart.title: Pipeline by Stage and Type
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, selection_item.title as _sales_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select and self.sales_stage_select not in (9, 10) GROUP BY _sales_stage ORDER BY _sales_stage

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.source.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.type.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, opportunity_type.name as _opportunity_type FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN crm_opportunity_type as opportunity_type ON self.opportunity_type = opportunity_type.id GROUP BY _opportunity_type ORDER BY _opportunity_type

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.leadsource.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) AS lead_won, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.salesman.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id GROUP BY _sales_man ORDER BY _sales_man

chart.name: chart.opportunities.by.origin.by.stage
chart.title: Opportunities By Origin By Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, self.source.name AS source, self.salesStageSelect AS stage FROM Opportunity self GROUP BY self.salesStageSelect, self.source.name ORDER BY self.salesStageSelect, self.source.name

chart.name: chart.leads.by.source.bar
chart.title: Leads by Source
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) AS leads, self.source.name AS source FROM Lead self GROUP BY self.source.name ORDER BY self.source.name

chart.name: chart.customers.by.country.bar
chart.title: Customers by country
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) as partners, country.name as countryName FROM Country country,Partner partner WHERE partner.mainInvoicingAddress.addressL7Country.id = country.id AND partner.isCustomer = true AND partner.customerTypeSelect = 3 GROUP BY country.id ORDER BY country.name

chart.name: chart.leads.by.team.by.status.bar
chart.title: Leads by Team by Status
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.opportunity_amount) AS _opportunity_amount, team.name AS _team, selection_item.title as _status FROM crm_lead as self LEFT JOIN base_team as team ON self.team = team.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.lead.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.status_select GROUP BY _status, _team ORDER BY _status, _team

chart.name: chart.leads.by.salesman.by.status.bar
chart.title: Leads by Salesman by Status
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.opportunity_amount) AS _opportunity_amount, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man, selection_item.title as _status FROM crm_lead as self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.lead.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.status_select and sales_man.full_name != '' GROUP BY _status, _sales_man ORDER BY _status, _sales_man

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.user.bar
chart.title: Calls type by user
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, sales_man.full_name AS _sales_man, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event AS self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.call.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.call_status_select GROUP BY _status, _sales_man ORDER BY _status, _sales_man

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.team.bar
chart.title: Calls type by team
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, team.name AS _team, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN base_team as team ON self.team = team.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.call.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.call_status_select GROUP BY _status, _team ORDER BY _team, _status

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.team.by.user.bar
chart.title: Calls by team by user
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man, team.name as _team FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id LEFT JOIN base_team as team ON self.team = team.id GROUP BY _team, _sales_man ORDER BY _team, _sales_man

chart.name: chart.open.tickets.by.priority.bar
chart.title: Open tickets by priority
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, selection_item.title AS _priority FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.ticket.priority.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.priority_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5 GROUP BY _priority ORDER BY _priority

chart.name: chart.open.ticket.priority.distribution.bar
chart.title: Ticket distribution by Priority
chart.dataset: SELECT cast(cast(COUNT(*) as decimal)/(select Count(*) from crm_event as event where event.ticket_status_select !=5 and event.priority_select > 0) * 100 as decimal (5,2)) AS _total_calls, selection_item.title AS _priority FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.ticket.priority.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.priority_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5 GROUP BY _priority ORDER BY _priority

chart.name: chart.open.tickets.by.status.bar
chart.title: Open tickets by status
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.status_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5 GROUP BY _status ORDER BY _status

chart.name: chart.agents.by.open.cases.bar
chart.title: Top agents by Open Tickets
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.status_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5 GROUP BY _status, _sales_man ORDER BY _status, _sales_man

chart.name: chart.customer.by.open.cases.bar
chart.title: Top clients by Open Cases
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, partner.full_name AS _partner, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event as self LEFT JOIN base_partner as partner ON self.client_partner = partner.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.status_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5 GROUP BY _status, _partner ORDER BY _status, _partner

chart.name: chart.leads.by.country.bar
chart.title: Leads by Country
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_leads, country.name AS _country FROM crm_lead as self LEFT JOIN base_country as country ON self.primary_country = country.id GROUP BY _country ORDER BY _country

chart.name: chart.partner.by.industry.sector.bar
chart.title: Partners by Industry Sector
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_partner, selection_item.title as _industry_sector FROM base_partner as self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'partner.industry.sectory.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.industry_sector_select and self.is_contact != true GROUP BY _industry_sector ORDER BY _industry_sector

chart.name: chart.user.call.target.gauge
chart.title: Calls emitted target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.callEmittedNumber*100/self.callEmittedNumberTarget AS _callEmittedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.callEmittedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.call.target.bar
chart.title: Call emitted historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.callEmittedNumber) AS _callEmittedNumber, SUM(self.callEmittedNumberTarget) AS _callEmittedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.meeting.target.gauge
chart.title: Meetings number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.meetingNumber*100/self.meetingNumberTarget AS _meetingNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.meetingNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.meeting.target.bar
chart.title: Meetings number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.meetingNumber) AS _meetingNumber, SUM(self.meetingNumberTarget) AS _meetingNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.amount.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities amount won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityAmountWon*100/self.opportunityAmountWonTarget AS _opportunityAmountWon FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityAmountWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.amount.won.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities amount won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityAmountWon) AS _opportunityAmountWon, SUM(self.opportunityAmountWonTarget) AS _opportunityAmountWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.created.number.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities created number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityCreatedNumber*100/self.opportunityCreatedNumberTarget AS _opportunityCreatedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityCreatedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.created.number.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities created number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityCreatedNumber) AS _opportunityCreatedNumber, SUM(self.opportunityCreatedNumberTarget) AS _opportunityCreatedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.created.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities created won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityCreatedWon*100/self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget AS _opportunityCreatedWon FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.created.won.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities created won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityCreatedWon) AS _opportunityCreatedWon, SUM(self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget) AS _opportunityCreatedWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.sales.order.amount.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Sales orders amount won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.salesOrderAmountWon*100/self.salesOrderAmountWonTarget AS _salesOrderAmountWon FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.salesOrderAmountWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.sales.order.amount.won.target.bar
chart.title: Sales orders amount won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.salesOrderAmountWon) AS _salesOrderAmountWon, SUM(self.salesOrderAmountWonTarget) AS _salesOrderAmountWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.sales.order.created.number.target.gauge
chart.title: Sales orders created number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.salesOrderCreatedNumber*100/self.salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget AS _salesOrderCreatedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.sales.order.created.number.target.bar
chart.title: Sales orders created number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedNumber) AS _salesOrderCreatedNumber, SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget) AS _salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.sales.order.created.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Sales orders created won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.salesOrderCreatedWon*100/self.salesOrderCreatedWonTarget AS _salesOrderCreatedWon FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.salesOrderCreatedWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.sales.order.created.won.target.bar
chart.title: Sales orders created won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedWon) AS _salesOrderCreatedWon, SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedWonTarget) AS _salesOrderCreatedWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.call.target.gauge
chart.title: Calls emitted target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.callEmittedNumber*100/self.callEmittedNumberTarget AS _callEmittedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.callEmittedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.call.target.bar
chart.title: Calls emitted historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.callEmittedNumber) AS _callEmittedNumber, SUM(self.callEmittedNumberTarget) AS _callEmittedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.meeting.target.gauge
chart.title: Meetings number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.meetingNumber*100/self.meetingNumberTarget AS _meetingNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.meetingNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.meeting.target.bar
chart.title: Meeting number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.meetingNumber) AS _meetingNumber, SUM(self.meetingNumberTarget) AS _meetingNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.opportunity.amount.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities amount won target competed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityAmountWon*100/self.opportunityAmountWonTarget AS _opportunityAmountWon FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityAmountWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.opportunity.amount.won.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities amount won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityAmountWon) AS _opportunityAmountWon, SUM(self.opportunityAmountWonTarget) AS _opportunityAmountWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.opportunity.created.number.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities created number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityCreatedNumber*100/self.opportunityCreatedNumberTarget AS _opportunityCreatedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityCreatedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.opportunity.created.number.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities created number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityCreatedNumber) AS _opportunityCreatedNumber, SUM(self.opportunityCreatedNumberTarget) AS _opportunityCreatedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.opportunity.created.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities created won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityCreatedWon*100/self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget AS _opportunityCreatedWon FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.opportunity.created.won.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities created won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityCreatedWon) AS _opportunityCreatedWon, SUM(self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget) AS _opportunityCreatedWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.title: Sales orders amount won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.salesOrderAmountWon*100/self.salesOrderAmountWonTarget AS _salesOrderAmountWon FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.salesOrderAmountWonTarget > 0

chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.salesOrderAmountWon) AS _salesOrderAmountWon, SUM(self.salesOrderAmountWonTarget) AS _salesOrderAmountWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.sales.order.created.number.target.gauge
chart.title: Sales orders created number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.salesOrderCreatedNumber*100/self.salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget AS _salesOrderCreatedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.sales.order.created.number.target.bar
chart.title: Sales orders created number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedNumber) AS _salesOrderCreatedNumber, SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget) AS _salesOrderCreatedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.sales.order.created.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Sales orders created won target completed
chart.dataset: SELECT self.salesOrderCreatedWon*100/self.salesOrderCreatedWonTarget AS _salesOrderCreatedWon FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.salesOrderCreatedWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.team.sales.order.created.won.target.bar
chart.title: Sales orders created won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedWon) AS _salesOrderCreatedWon, SUM(self.salesOrderCreatedWonTarget) AS _salesOrderCreatedWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate
